title: Didn't get promoted.
body:
Hi guys. Story is a simple one.

Went into Gold promos with 1 win because I failed my previous attempt.
Game 1: Lost with Garen
Game 2: Lost with Master Yi
Game 3: Won with Leblanc
Game 4: Won with Leblanc

No promotion.

I read up on boards and they said to just wait it out. That was last night. If you could look into it, it would be greatly appreciated.

Cheers!

replies.body:
Did you verify that you had a free Promo Helper win when you started the series? If you had dodged and lost your last series you don't get a Promo Helper win the next time.

Did you dodge a game in your series this time? Dodging in series counts as an automatic loss and also loses your Promo Helper win.

Did you get the 'Series failed' message at the end of your match or did you exit the lobby and just see that you weren't promoted?

Were you still in your series at this time?

If none of these questions help, I suggest submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They may be able to tell you why you weren't in your series still, and if it's a bug they'll probably ask you to submit a report on the forum, but they don't give free wins or otherwise interfere with your rank.

Yeah, pretty sure - now doubting myself having spoken to Riot Support.

No, dodged last game, which would have been irrelevant to series if I had started with the free win.

It's all good. I spoke to them via a Support Ticket and they were very helpful. Told me I had no Promo Helper win to start with.

Not a big deal, I'll get there one day.
Sorry to hear that. Better luck next time. You got there before and can do it again!
